channel.title: What Kind of Poster Are You?
channel.description:
A website known as "[url='https://redwing.hutman.net/~mreed/index.htm']Flame Warriors[/url]" catalogs the type of people that post to message boards, Internet fora and USENET newsgroups. Here I hope to 'troll' the waters (as it were) to see what kind of "flame warrior" you are.
I'm generally a cross between a [url='https://redwing.hutman.net/~mreed/warriorshtm/yukyuk.htm']Yuk Yuk[/url] and an [url='https://redwing.hutman.net/~mreed/warriorshtm/ideologue.htm']Ideologue[/url] with a bit of [url='https://redwing.hutman.net/~mreed/warriorshtm/tirelessrebutter.htm']Tireless Rebutter[/url] thrown in for good measure.
How about you?
NOTE: I'd like to keep this contained to simply what type of "warrior" you are; I would rather not have a flame war start over which "warrior" is better and such nonsense like that. Thanks![/SIZE]

item.title: What Kind of Poster Are You?

item.description:
I think the board is full of evil clowns.

item.title: What Kind of Poster Are You?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Imonfire:

If I were to be a poster, I think I’d be a Daft Punk poster. I mean, they’re pretty cool, aren’t they? Especially this one. Should I buy it? At 24 x 36, it’s only 25$ including shipping.

Fucker stole my joke.

I can’t be arsed to read the site but I consider myself to be a deadpan snarker.

Read full topic

item.title: What Kind of Poster Are You?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
A website known as “Flame Warriors” catalogs the type of people that post to message boards, Internet fora and USENET newsgroups. Here I hope to ‘troll’ the waters (as it were) to see what kind of “flame warrior” you are.

I’m generally a cross between a Yuk Yuk and an Ideologue with a bit of Tireless Rebutter thrown in for good measure.

How about you?

NOTE: I’d like to keep this contained to simply what type of “warrior” you are; I would rather not have a flame war start over which “warrior” is better and such nonsense like that. Thanks![/SIZE]

Read full topic
item.source: What Kind of Poster Are You?
